paragraphs: All citizens of Haj Uxith must take heed! Our agreement with Molag Bal permits the Lord of Brutality's minions to extract and refine sap from our beloved Hist tree. Furthermore, we are prohibited from entering the sap vat chamber or from interfering with the sap collection and refinement process in any way.
Violating this agreement or disregarding this warning can result in punishment not only for you, but for the entire Argonian community of Haj Uxith.
Thank you for your attention in this matter.
